Package curam.util.exception

Contains the various exception types thrown by Curam and classes used to manipulate these exceptions

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InformationalElement
    Class used to describe an Informational Element.
    InformationalElement.InformationalType
    An enumerated type used to describe the various kinds of informational that can occur.
    InformationalManager
    Informational Manager class which will hold & manage all validation failures and informational messages for a transaction.
    LocalisableString
    LocalisableString is commonly used in Curam applications to produce a string which can be localized by the client.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AppException
    AppException is commonly thrown in Curam applications to indicate a condition that the calling code might wish to handle.
    AppRuntimeException
    An unchecked exception that can be thrown by various Curam infrastructure facilities.
    DatabaseException
    Unchecked exception thrown by data access code.
    DateConversionException
    Conversion exception thrown when constructing Dates and DateTimes.
    DuplicateRecordException
    Unchecked exception thrown by data access code when a database record insert would result in a duplicate value in a unique column.
    InformationalException
    Class used to describe the exception that is produced by the InformationalManager and InformationalElement.
    MultipleRecordException
    Unchecked exception thrown by data access code when a read operation which was expected to be a singleton operation retrieves multiple records.
    OtherDatabaseException
    Unchecked exception thrown by data access code when a database operation results in an error which is not otherwise special-cased by the Curam infrastructure.
    OverflowException
    Unchecked exception thrown by data access code when a database record insert or modify request contains a field that is too large for it's corresponding database column.
    ReadmultiMaxException
    ReadmultiMaxException is an unchecked exception thrown by Data Access Layer code when a multiple read retrieves more records than the maximum specified in the application model.
    RecordChangedException
    Unchecked exception thrown when an optimistic update fails because the target record has changed.
    RecordDeletedException
    Unchecked exception thrown when an optimistic update fails because the target record has been deleted.
    RecordLockedException
    Unchecked exception thrown when an attempt to access a record results in a lock exception.
    RecordNotFoundException
    RecordNotFoundException is an unchecked exception thrown by data access code when a singleton database read retrieves no records.
    StructAssignmentException
    Exception occuring during the assignment of Struct classes.
    SvrRemoteException
    This is the exception type thrown from Curam servers to remote clients.
    UnimplementedException
    May be used in application to indicate that an operation is currently unimplemented.

Package curam.util.exception Description

Contains the various exception types thrown by Curam and classes used to manipulate these exceptions.
Since:
Curam SDEJ3.0.0
